title: Essential Oil Crystal Roller - Perfume Scent - Aromatherapy
description: 10ml each roller bottle is filled with charged crystals, essential oils, and coconut oil. Assorted crystals in each scent. Each blend is perfectly balanced with top, middle, and low notes of essential oils. Enjoy them all day! Earthy scents perfect for men or women. Peaceful Sleep Blend - Headache Ease - Energizing B
